sentences.en: Assassin, I will turn you into the Spirit Form for now.
sentences.cn: 我现在就把你转化为完全的灵体.

sentences.en: Ben Mattes of Ubisoft shows an upcoming version of Assassin's Creed.
sentences.cn: 本育碧马茨显示了刺客的信条即将推出的版本.

sentences.en: Beware mercy A turned back is no defense against an assassin's knife.
sentences.cn: 当心怜悯.背后是挡不住刺客的刀子的.

sentences.en: He alleged that they had hired an assassin to dispose of him.
sentences.cn: 他宣称他们已雇了刺客来除掉他。

sentences.en: He fell a victim to the dagger of an assassin.
He is paralyzed as the result of a would - be assassin's bullet years ago.
sentences.cn: 几年前有人对他行刺未遂,但子弹使他瘫痪了.

sentences.en: He saw the shooting and memorised the number of the assassin's car.
sentences.cn: 他目睹了枪击过程并记住了刺客的车牌号码。

sentences.en: I am not risking my whole life on the'Ninja Assassin.
sentences.cn: 我不能拿我的一辈子冒险的赌在'忍者刺客'.

sentences.en: Kennedy was struck down by an assassin's bullet.
sentences.cn: 肯尼迪被刺客的子弹击中而身亡.

sentences.en: Kennedy’s assassin is assumed to have been Lee Harvey Oswald.
sentences.cn: 暗杀肯尼迪的人据说是李·哈维·奥斯瓦尔德。

sentences.en: Lucia hired an assassin to eliminate her rival.
sentences.cn: 露西娅雇用了一名刺客去除掉她的情敌.

sentences.en: The assassin was adjudged an extremist.
sentences.cn: 那个行刺者被认为是个极端主义分子.

sentences.en: The assassin was sentenced to death.
The Emperor and the Assassin is her third collaboration with Chen Kaige.
sentences.cn: 《荆柯刺秦王》是她第三次与陈凯歌合作.

sentences.en: The oil baron was killed by an assassin.
sentences.cn: 这位石油大亨被刺客杀害了.

sentences.en: Week of Assassin: Double growth for Scouts and Assassins.
sentences.cn: 刺客周: 侦察兵与刺客产量加倍.

trans.tran_en: someone who murders an important person
